title: Xtremevision OEM Replacement Ballast Compatible with 5DV007760-15 Xenon HID Ballast - D2S/D2R (Single - 1 PCS)
features: The OE replacement ballast is brand new and is designed to exceed all OE specifications. The replacement ballast is not OEM but is fully Plug-and-Play and will be direct replacement of your factory unit.
XtremeVision® HID OE Replacement Ballasts are compatible with OEM HID bulbs.

Please verify your factory ballast and connectors matches the product on the image exactly before placing an order. Certain manufacturers may change the ballast type when there is a mid-cycle refresh or new production date.
2 Year Hassle Free Warranty - Live Tech Support via Phone & E-Mail
description: 5DV007760-15 OE Replacement Ballast can be used to replace your defective factory OEM HID Ballast. The OE replacement ballast is brand new and is designed to exceed all OE specifications. The replacement ballast is not OEM but is fully Plug-and-Play and will be direct replacement of your factory unit. The unit will also be backed by our 2-Year Warranty that is not offered on OEM unit that is purchased directly from the dealership, which is also five times more expensive without any type of guarantee. Note: Certain manufacturers may change the ballast type when there is a mid-cycle refresh or new production date. Please confirm the part number and that both front/back images matches the ballast you are replacing.
